name: The Golden Stopwatch
description:
Can you escape the pyramid with the help of a magical golden stopwatch? Change the properties of an object and the laws of gravity by turning them into gold. But hurry! If you spend over a minutes in a chamber, the stopwatch will end you... 

This game was made by me (AlYourPal) in 2 days for the Mini Jam 85 with the theme: gold and 1 minute timer. It was made in 2 days instead of 3 because I couldn't start the day it started...
